meanings.definition: The skill or technique of a draftsman.
meanings.sent1: His draftsmanships were evident in the precise lines of his drawings.
meanings.sent2: She admired the draftsmanships of the architect's detailed blueprints.
meanings.sent3: The competition for the best draftsmanships in the art class was fierce.
meanings.sent4: Her draftsmanships were like a finely tuned instrument, creating beautiful designs effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The art exhibition showcased the incredible draftsmanships of talented artists.

meanings.definition: The quality of being a draftsman.
meanings.sent1: The award recognized his exceptional draftsmanships in the field of architecture.
meanings.sent2: Attention to detail is a key aspect of his draftsmanships as an artist.
meanings.sent3: His sense of humor added a unique flair to his draftsmanships as a cartoonist.
meanings.sent4: The draftsmanships of the old master were passed down through generations of artists.
meanings.sent5: The professor praised the students for their dedication to improving their draftsmanships.
